xinstall.name: "Call Me Back"-layover
xinstall.description: Call-Me-Back layover for your website (called using JavaScript).

param.name: css_name
param.label: CSS postfix
param.description: A value that will be added to all default class / id values for module identification.

param.name: show_button
param.label: Show button
param.description: Toggles the showing of a action button (to open layover).

param.name: email
param.label: E-mail address
param.description: The e-mail address to sent requests to.

param.name: subject
param.label: E-mail subject
param.description: The subject of the e-mail being send.
